doc:
Lou Nova https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lou_Nova 0 Lou Nova (March 16, 1913 – September 29, 1991) aka Cosmic punch was an American boxer and actor. Born in Los Angeles, California, the 6 ft 3 1⁄2 in (1.92 m) Nova was the U.S. and World Amateur Boxing Champion in 1935. After turning pro, he remained undefeated in his first 22 matches, and won 40 fights in total. He was the first top rated boxer to practice yoga, and reportedly did headstands in the dressing room before his title bout with Joe Louis. Lou_Nova ( March_16_,_1913 – September_29_,_1991 ) aka_Cosmic_punch was an_American_boxer_and_actor . Born in Los_Angeles , California , the_6_ft_3 1⁄2 in (_1.92_m_)_Nova was the_U.S._and_World_Amateur_Boxing_Champion in 1935 . After turning pro , he remained undefeated in his_first_22_matches , and won 40_fights in total . He was the_first_top_rated_boxer to_practice yoga , and reportedly_did headstands in the_dressing_room before his_title_bout with Joe_Louis .
